name: Figma File
info: Recently i switched to UI/UX designing and i make designs everyday. After that i upload them on my Twitter and Dribbble. I have a lot of figma files that i can show you. Just let me know and i will share the link with you.

name: Gridserve
info: GRIDSERVE is a sustainable energy company focused on achieving net-zero transport through solar-powered EV charging networks and car leasing while utilizing a proprietary data platform.

name: Career Institute
info: Career Institute is a pioneering institution committed to delivering quality education and professional training to bridge the industry gap for both local and international markets, preparing students for future career success.

name: Seller Count
info: Sellercount is the first and largest searchable database of TikTok ads. Without having to spend all your time looking for a product.
